field.name: category
field.label: Select a category
field.description: Apply this object type to selected category

field.name: custom_desc_type
field.label: Description Type
field.description: How should the Open Graph Description (og:desc) be generated? From metatag information or category description

field.name: custom_desc_length
field.label: Description Length
field.description: Number of words or characters from beginning of category text to use as the Open Graph description. This option is only used if 'Category Text' is selected for Description Type.

field.name: custom_image_type
field.label: Image Type
field.description: How should the Open Graph Image (og:image) be generated? From category image or a custom provided image

field.name: custom_image_path
field.label: Custom Image Path
field.description: This should be a URL to the image and is only used if 'Custom Image' is selected for Image Type.
